column4: just installed ubuntu new to linux I came home and my mom went to check her mail and firefox asked her to create a new user, well she did and now icons pop up on the desktop everytime I sign on mozilla, I already tried uninstalling it... any ideas?

just installed ubuntu (breezy badger) new to linux I came home and my mom went to check her mail and firefox asked her to create a new user, well she did and now icons pop up on the desktop everytime I sign on mozilla, I already tried uninstalling it... any ideas?
just create a new user profile, so you and your mom wouldn't have to share your porn site history :)
